page.title: 03 Shopping in Torpoint cont.1
page.content: { Shoppers questions cont. { 4. Which shop do you use most in {Torpoint? { 5. Do the Torpoint shops give you {enough choice? { 6. Should there be shops on the {housing estates? { 7. How many times a week do you shop {in Torpoint? { 8. Is there enough parking in {Torpoint for shoppers? { } RESULTS. 1. a) 27 b) 13 c) 2 2. a) 11 b) 31 3. 8 people would like a Departmental Store,1 a Butchers,4 a Fish mongers,1 a Record Shop,2 a Rennant Shop,1 a Chandlers and 3 a Shoe Shop. 4.Co-op is the most used shop with 26 people using it but 6 people use the Butchers,1 the Bakers,2 the Chemists.
